00018 #include <stdlib.h>
00019 #include "ecorrelation.h"
00020 #include <math.h>
00021 #include <list>
00022 #include <votca/tools/average.h>
00023 #include <votca/csg/nblistgrid.h>

00025 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00026 
00027 void Ecorrelation::Initialize(QMTopology* top, Property* options) {
00028 
00029    // read in _nbins
00030    if (options->exists("options.ecorrelation.nbins")) {
00031         _nbins = options->get("options.ecorrelation.nbins").as<int>();
00032    }
00033    else {
00034         _nbins = 15;
00035         cout << "Warning: nbins for site energy distribution is not provided, using default "
00036              << "nbins = " << _nbins << endl;
00037    }
00038 
00039    // read in min and max
00040    _min = options->get("options.ecorrelation.min").as<double>();
00041    _max = options->get("options.ecorrelation.max").as<double>();
00042 
00043    // read in _outfile
00044    if (options->exists("options.ecorrelation.file")) {
00045         _outfile = options->get("options.ecorrelation.file").as<string>();
00046    }
00047    else {
00048         _outfile = "ecorrelation.dat";
00049         cout << "Warning: output filename for site energy distribution is not provided, using default "
00050              << "filename = " << _outfile << endl;
00051    }
00052 
00053    // initialize histograms
00054    _hist_corr.Initialize(_min, _max, _nbins);
00055    _hist_count.Initialize(_min, _max, _nbins);
00056    _hist_corr2.Initialize(_min, _max, _nbins);
00057 
00058    // set yerror = true
00059    _hist_corr.data().SetHasYErr(true);
00060 }
00061 
00062 bool Ecorrelation::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology* top) {
00063 
00064     Average<double> energy_av;
00065 
00066     // working topology = topology to do work
00067     Topology mytop;
00068     BeadList list1;
00069     NBListGrid mynbl;
00070 
00071     mytop.setBox(top->getBox());
00072 
00073     vector<QMCrgUnit *> lcharges = top->CrgUnits();
00074     vector<QMCrgUnit *>::iterator itl;
00075     // 1) calculate average energy
00076     // 2) for every charge unit of real topology make a bead for a working topology
00077     for (itl = lcharges.begin(); itl!=lcharges.end(); ++itl) {
00078         // Process data to get the average
00079         energy_av.Process ( (*itl)->getTotalEnergy() );
00080 
00081         // make a simple spherical bead for a new topology
00082         BeadType *tmptype = mytop.GetOrCreateBeadType("no");
00083         Bead * tmpbead = mytop.CreateBead(1, "bead", tmptype, 0, 1, 0);
00084         // position of the bead = position of the corresponding crgunit
00085         tmpbead->setPos( (*itl)->GetCom() );
00086         // additionally it stores a pointer to the corresponding crgunit
00087         tmpbead->setUserData( (*itl) );
00088     }
00089 
00090     // mean energy and standard deviation for a particular snapshot
00091     _mean_energy = energy_av.getAvg();
00092     _stdev_energy = energy_av.CalcSig2();
00093 
00094     list1.Generate(mytop, "*");
00095     mynbl.SetMatchFunction(this, &Ecorrelation::MyMatchingFunction);
00096     mynbl.setCutoff(_max);
00097     mynbl.Generate( list1, false );
00098 
00099     return true;
00100 }
00101 
00102 void Ecorrelation::EndEvaluate(QMTopology* top) {
00103     // normalize
00104     _hist_corr.data().y() = element_div( _hist_corr.data().y(), _hist_count.data().y() );
00105     _hist_corr2.data().y() = element_div( _hist_corr2.data().y(), _hist_count.data().y() );
00106 
00107     // calculate error bars: UGLY!!!
00108     for (int i=0; i<_hist_corr.data().yerr().size(); i++) {
00109         _hist_corr.data().yerr(i) = sqrt ( (_hist_corr2.data().y(i) -
00110                 _hist_corr.data().y(i)*_hist_corr.data().y(i) ) / _hist_count.data().y(i) );
00111     }
00112     
00113     // Save to file
00114     _hist_corr.data().Save(_outfile);
00115 }
00116 
00117 bool Ecorrelation::MyMatchingFunction(Bead *bead1, Bead *bead2, const vec & r, const double notused) {
00118 
00119     QMCrgUnit *crg1 = bead1->getUserData<QMCrgUnit>();
00120     QMCrgUnit *crg2 = bead2->getUserData<QMCrgUnit>();
00121 
00122     double e1 = crg1->getTotalEnergy();
00123     double e2 = crg2->getTotalEnergy();
00124     double dist = abs(r);
00125 //    cout << "e1= " << e1 << "  e2= " << e2 << " dist = " << dist;
00126 
00127     double contrib = (e1-_mean_energy)*(e2-_mean_energy)/_stdev_energy;
00128 
00129     _hist_count.Process( dist );
00130     _hist_corr.Process( dist, contrib );
00131     _hist_corr2.Process( dist, contrib*contrib );
00132 
00133     return false;
00134 }
